entries.abort: You have aborted the mission!  What will the convoy do without you?
entries.arrival_greeting: This is convoy leader, do you copy?  Wait for my command to push forward.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait at this location.  The convoy will be exiting hyperspace momentarily.
entries.attack_notify: Orion fighters!  Fight them off before they can disrupt the convoy!
entries.convoy_destroyed: All ships have been lost.  You have failed your mission.  Return to base.
entries.convoy_safe: A convoy ship has safely jumped to lightspeed.
entries.convoy_ship_lost: A convoy ship has been lost.  Ensure the rest survive!
entries.found_loc: Meet the convoy at the following location.
entries.hull_half: Mayday, mayday!  I'm hurtin' pretty bad here!
entries.no_convoy: The full convoy hasn't arrived yet. We can't leave without the rest.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freightor convoy to their destination.  Be wary of attacking Orions.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Nova Orion Sector or Ord Mantell
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Head to the beginning waypoint to rendezvous with the freightor convoy.
entries.quest_update: Find the convoy and escort them to safety!
entries.ready_to_go: We're set.  Open a comm channel with any of our ships to give us the 'go' order.
entries.shields_depleted: I have no shields left!  Switching all power to weapons!
entries.taunt_1: All your cargo belongs to us!
entries.taunt_3: Stop, and we won't harm you...much!
entries.thanks_1: Thanks for getting us out of that!
entries.title: Protect the Nova Convoy
entries.title_d: Meet up with the freightor convoy, and escort them through a dangerous area of space.
